column1: Happy Thanksgiving from our family to yours! 🦃 🦃   Thanksgiving may look different right now but family alone is a cause for celebration (virtually for us with Abigail today). This year both my husband John and my dad recovered from COVID and for that we are so thankful.
More than 2000 people died from COVID-19 yesterday. Someone lost a loved one every 40 seconds of the day. Please take care of yourself and your family wear a mask and help slow the spread.
This is so sobering. Show it to anyone who doesn’t believe how bad this is right now.   Resurgent COVID-19 races through Minnesota senior homes spared in the spring. https://t.co/Cemcibjk9j

“No beds anywhere”  This is the word from our Hospitals.   No party or gathering is worth it right now. Stay safe & Stay home. Follow the rules. This is the worst time to get sick & a vaccine is on the way.   MN hospitals strained to limit by COVID-19. https://t.co/rsb23NAPQj

This is a really tough time for our state but there is hope on the horizon.   I joined Dr. Ana Nunez at the University of Minnesota calling for federal support to help states prepare for safe and efficient coronavirus vaccine distribution.  We will get through this together. https://t.co/vvmXgfQF2Z

Even the best prepared hospitals in the country are struggling to cope with the influx of COVID patients. America needs strong leadership in the White House & we need Republicans to work with us & act quickly to overcome this pandemic. Lives are at stake. https://t.co/Y0X8iw9b4Q

Sending love to @Maddow & Susan. I got to know Susan a bit over the years & they are as in love as Rachel describes. That experience of having someone get COVID & not be able to see them is something we now sadly share. Rachel is right — stay safe for those you love. https://t.co/l3e9PodiQO

U of M needed green light to move ahead w/their proposal for fast & effective testing. We don’t have enough tests that are affordable. I worked w/U & FDA & HHS to move this ahead & good news this week.   The COVID testing shouldn’t just be done by a handful of big companies. https://t.co/xR8MZQNIhf

I joined @BarbaraCEO and Dr. Madeleine Gagnon @GilletteChildrn today to share one simple but critical message:  It’s time to get your flu vaccine!  As we head into flu season with a surge in COVID cases getting the flu vaccine is more important than ever. It will save lives. https://t.co/jAlyaZSvuO

Getting the coronavirus under control needs to be our country’s top priority. It is directly related to getting the economy back on track stopping the closure of small businesses and getting everyone back to work & back to school. https://t.co/PZ5eZlygCU

Congratulations to Minnesota’s own infection disease expert  @mtosterholm for his appointment to @JoeBiden’s 12-member coronavirus task force. I know Mike will do a great job getting us through this pandemic and following the science!

Americans need access to healthcare. Americans need protections for pre-existing conditions. Americans need a plan to tackle COVID. Americans need economic relief.   To get all this done vote for my friends @JoeBiden and @TinaSmithMN. Go to https://t.co/UhHlRooBej & VOTE today! https://t.co/WKHtGir4GK
Today we are honoring all of the lives tragically lost to COVID in Minnesota.   We are all mourning.  https://t.co/l3nX5dLcqT

So why are we rushing through a justice instead of rushing through a COVID relief package.  Call Republican senators and ask. #Priorities   US jobless claims rise to 898000 with layoffs still high. https://t.co/qG6Xpm2ORC

Bob McDonald the winningest coach in Minnesota high school sports history died today in Hibbing at age 87 after being diagnosed with COVID-19.    He coached the Chisholm boys’ team for 53 seasons. 🙏 https://t.co/tlajlRWcwK

Today’s hearing isn't normal. The Senate should be working for the 7.7 million who’ve suffered from COVID. We should be helping the workers small businesses and parents that are struggling.  We shouldn't be filling a Supreme Court seat--we should be passing a relief package.
Seriously?  Knowing the last negative test would help everyone.....    Trump suggests coronavirus infection came from interaction with Gold Star families https://t.co/LUskdpMVHx
Minnesota communities are suffering and need help. I recently spoke with local leaders in Northwest Minnesota about the need for a new round of COVID relief.  https://t.co/JrwxeDQHe1
It’s outrageous that Mitch McConnell and the GOP are trying to ram through this confirmation when they should be passing a new COVID relief bill. https://t.co/Jlxx7Hg0su

This is truly unconscionable. It’s an insult to the Secret Service who put their lives at risk for him every day. It’s an insult to those treating him at the hospital.   Trump Just Exposed Secret Service to COVID to Do a Drive-By for MAGA Supporters  https://t.co/WMRm1WW2Sx

Watch my interview with Chris Wallace this morning -- we talked about the President's health @JoeBiden's leadership the coronavirus response and the Supreme Court. And I didn't interrupt him once! https://t.co/DD6QlT88wk

Mothers of young children are 3 TIMES more likely to have lost their job during COVID.   Think about that. This is yet another troubling reminder that Americans need the Senate to pass a relief bill.  https://t.co/eMKEymyYDA

As we wish the President a speedy recovery today remember the front line workers & everyone who gets COVID who doesn’t make headlines. Republicans have sat on COVID relief & more funding for testing & economic help for months. Cases are up.  People are hurting. No more excuses.
To all the brave women and men out there on the frontlines of the fight against COVID the state of Minnesota and our nation cannot thank you enough for all that you do.  https://t.co/8QDp8Y1euV
The COVID vaccine should not be political. Too many lives are at stake.
CDC reverses itself and says guidelines it posted on coronavirus airborne transmission were wrong   https://t.co/WKIXsOkQH4

COVID cases in the Midwest have been surging as this Administration has done nothing to create a national testing strategy leaving cash-strapped states to fend for themselves.   We need a new leader in the White House. https://t.co/ChvgxgVYiG
Donald Trump knew how deadly COVID was back in February but chose to say nothing. Now he’s holding a rally INDOORS. The American people deserve better than this. https://t.co/6Dfdtv70WZ

My husband got COVID and ended up in the hospital on oxygen.  At the same time my husband and so many others were sick Donald Trump knew how deadly COVID is and downplayed it. For me this is personal. https://t.co/Mxyg4aBdaC
WH Interfered with CDC over COVID   The administration shouldn’t be playing politics with peoples’ lives. https://t.co/c5Iflwk6FF

The pandemic has put a magnifying glass on the challenges of accessing mental health services in rural areas.  I’m urging my colleagues to join me in passing my bipartisan bill to establish a Coronavirus Mental Health and Addiction Assistance Network. https://t.co/JNtDiYZJ0w

For me the pandemic is personal. My husband was hospitalized with the virus and my dad got diagnosed with COVID in his nursing home.   Americans need a President who will be straightforward & transparent not someone who will hide the truth and let nearly 200000 Americans die. https://t.co/j9JllkiHRu

“Prescription drug orders filled by mail have risen by one-fifth during the coronavirus pandemic the report found and delivery times for medications generally increased by as much as one-third."  Completely unacceptable. Lives are at stake.  https://t.co/w4cSsQ7Xrr

President Trump knew exactly how dangerous and deadly the coronavirus would be — and he chose to “play it down.” He lied and put millions of Americans at risk. It’s a dereliction of duty plain and simple. https://t.co/Ne6Keihivs

The majority of poll workers are 61 and older— a population more vulnerable to the coronavirus.  We need a new generation to sign up and make sure our elections run safely on November 3. https://t.co/P1AVpgq6Ut   Minnesotans — learn more here!  https://t.co/0sJgiJ5xSC

Yesterday I joined @maryswingle and Bryan Donaldson (@MNCommunityGuy) in St. Cloud to talk about how nonprofits like the Boys & Girls Clubs have adapted during COVID and why we need to pass my WORK NOW Act to help these vital organizations.  https://t.co/165Ta4DKd3

From covid relief to election security so many bills that will move America forward are sitting on McConnell's desk collecting dust. We need to flip the Senate so we can start tackling the challenges we face.   Check out some candidates who will win big: https://t.co/Pf3HdCoq7K
Did Donald Trump just congratulate Pence for his work on Corona Virus?  Did he just take a bow to Republican applause for 180000 dead? 🛑🤥

Donald Trump just said he has done more for African Americans than any President since Lincoln. Does he mean when he said there were “2 sides” after Charlottesville the racial disparities in deaths from COVID the lack of action on police reform or the voter suppression. 🛑 🤥

Yes Mike Pompeo is actually speaking at the Republican convention and just said “China virus.”  We have worked so hard as a nation to make our dealings with other countries and our place of leadership in the world above politics. I want it back. #VoteBiden

Mitch McConnell—the Senate must come back and act immediately to address changes in the U.S. Postal Service made by Postmaster DeJoy and pass a coronavirus relief package.   American lives and our democracy depends on it. https://t.co/qP1ctFrjGm
Earlier this week our country lost almost 1500 lives in one day from the coronavirus.  Mr. President that’s not following the science—that’s completely ignoring it.

Seven months and over 5 million cases of coronavirus later and the Trump administration still doesn’t have an adequate national testing strategy.  That’s why we need @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris in the White House.

AFM is a disease that causes patients’ muscles to weaken with no known cure & mainly affects children. Recently the CDC warned that cases could spike later this year. As the country continues to tackle the coronavirus I'm urging the CDC to prepare for future outbreaks of AFM.

.⁦@keithellison⁩ & I sounded alarm on this months ago. Watch out.👀 I’ve gotten several scam calls& they’re everywhere including by email. Once I had to call Excel Energy & confirm we owed no $ after scam call: Coronavirus scams are sweeping nation. https://t.co/I0IlG61tTM

The American people don't want someone who pretends the coronavirus isn't happening. They don't want someone who continues to spread disinformation.   Americans want someone who they can trust and can empathize with them. And they know that someone is @JoeBiden.

Our country has been tackling the coronavirus for months. Yet the President continues to promote disinformation and belittles its seriousness.   The American people are tired of the lies and empty promises—and that will show in November.

The U.S. is 4% of the world population—yet has 25% of the world’s coronavirus cases and 22% of deaths.  None of this adds up—and the President is turning his back on the seriousness of this pandemic.  It’s time for new leadership for the American people.
Minnesota has been asked by the Center for Disease Control to be one of four states for pilot #Covid_19 vaccine distribution planning.  🦠 💉
Our country has over 4.5 million confirmed coronavirus cases. That’s 4.5 million reasons why we need a President who can actually lead us through this crisis.

This pandemic is a national public health crisis. I’m proud Reps. @ScottPetersCA52 & @bradwenstrup introduced companion legislation to my bill to raise awareness about the importance of donating plasma in the House. We must work together to fight the coronavirus.

This pandemic is a national public health crisis. Thanks to Reps. @ScottPetersCA52 & @bradwenstrup the House version of my bipartisan bill to raise awareness about the importance of donating plasma. We must work together to fight the coronavirus.
REMINDER: testing is a critical part of defeating this pandemic—it has never been (and never will be) a contributing factor to the spread of the coronavirus.

The problem with COVID-19 testing delays.....  (Or you barricade yourself in a room all week waiting for the results doing everything right and then you find out you don’t have it.)   And hey White House the national testing strategy is??????  https://t.co/dkCmNh1khk

With daily record-breaking coronavirus cases how will the Administration help our country through this crisis without a national testing strategy & a lack of personal protective equipment for front line workers?  Asking for the American people.

I’d rather put ballots in the mailbox than put people in the hospital.  As I said on @CNN today with @PoppyHarlowCNN the Senate must work together to ensure the coronavirus package includes funding so states can expand early voting & vote by mail. We have to get it done. https://t.co/EDHuV6094G
Donald Trump said last weekend he’s opposed to money for coronavirus testing.  COVID-19 cases are at an all-time high. Americans can’t afford to wait on these tests. https://t.co/DHbwfKfGwA

Yesterday I spoke at @MHealthFairview in Minneapolis about how donating plasma is critical to tackling this pandemic. If you’ve recovered from the coronavirus talk to your doctor and visit https://t.co/vRN9TEB28v to learn more.  https://t.co/QSN9xZbpBb
If you have recovered from the coronavirus talk to your doctor to donate plasma.   It will save lives.    Learn more at https://t.co/vRN9TEB28v https://t.co/981Wdz9Juw

People who have recovered from the coronavirus can help others who have it by donating plasma. This is an important step in fighting the pandemic. Today I spoke at @MHealthFairview with Dr. Claudia Cohen and Matt Schrag about my bill to raise awareness about donating plasma. https://t.co/BvJyRjZxiG

As COVID-19 cases continue to rise there has been an increase in reports of scammers posing as contact tracers in attempts to steal seniors’ money and information. Sen. @JerryMoran and I are urging the FTC to protect and educate seniors about these bad actors.

The coronavirus pandemic is not going away. As we approach fall we have to make teachers students and everyone who works or goes to school is safe. @KamalaHarris is right supporting them in the midst of this pandemic must be a top priority for everyone. https://t.co/Y2nwZdTVZZ

Remember the President’s words from the Republican convention in 2016: “I alone can fix this.”  As of today the U.S. is at a record 60000 Covid cases a day.   We’re still waiting.  https://t.co/mdXGKz9hxr

Since the pandemic began in March each week that Donald Trump has failed to address the coronavirus over a million Americans have filed for unemployment.  It’s time for a real leader in the White House. One that will build our country back—better.  That leader is VP @JoeBiden. https://t.co/DVd953R4QT

Reality check:  → Black women are more likely to die from childbirth → People of color are disproportionately affected by the coronavirus  → Communities of color are disproportionately shut out at the ballot box  These injustices have always existed. It’s time to change that.

→ 3 million total cases of COVID-19 → No real national testing strategy → A lack of protective equipment for our front line workers  The President had months to prepare & he's still refusing to acknowledge that this virus is a threat. What more will it take for him to lead?

Donating plasma is critical to helping our country get through this pandemic. People who have had COVID-19 can donate plasma and their antibodies to help others who are sick get better. I’m calling on HHS to raise awareness about the importance of donating plasma.

Last week the President said “This crisis is being handled.”  There have been 40000+ new daily coronavirus cases across the country & many states are reversing their plans to reopen.  No Mr. President this crisis isn't being handled. It's time the Administration takes action.

We must protect people at high-risk from COVID-19 like seniors while we face this pandemic. But it shouldn’t prevent anyone from seeing their loved ones. That’s why I’m working to help senior living facilities expand telehealth services & provide funding for virtual visits. https://t.co/NrXV7Wvrak

Today I joined @aarpmn director Will Phillips & Julie Organ at the Good Samaritan Specialty Care Community to talk about how I’m working to make sure COVID-19 doesn’t prevent seniors from seeing their loved ones by increasing access to technology so they can have virtual visits. https://t.co/xmAZUZGCB6

Andrea Circle Bear was jailed for a non-violent offense & died from COVID-19 while giving birth on a ventilator. Paul Manafort was released for fears of the virus. AG Barr won’t answer my questions about who's prioritized. We deserve real answers. https://t.co/oxfOA0grpq

When it comes to the coronavirus Americans trust the experts.   And the Trump administration must do the same by actually listening to health experts instead of pushing a misleading narrative that puts the American people in harm's way.  https://t.co/tA42wuzuMo

Coronavirus cases are continuing to rise. It’s clear we need more testing—not less testing. I’m proud @MayoClinic is leading the way in innovative antibody testing and new treatments. This critical research will help our country while we face this virus.  https://t.co/BUNkD0MYbp
FACT CHECK: Testing does not (and cannot) spread the coronavirus.

Yesterday I toured @MayoClinic with CEO @GFarrugiaMD to discuss innovation in antibody testing and new treatments for COVID-19. As cases continue to rise testing and research are how we come back stronger -- and I’m proud of Mayo Clinic’s incredible work. https://t.co/8aUfR4R5Ze

A number of white-collar defendants like Paul Manafort have been released from jail because of COVID-19. But many nonviolent offenders haven't.  Barr's response? He won’t say who they are prioritizing for release.  That's not good enough. I’ll keep demanding answers.

So as the President claims ballot fraud we find out this is how he and his pals vote.    And none of them stood in line in the rain or got COVID while voting:   16 Trump officials who have voted by mail recently despite Trump’s warnings about it  https://t.co/VX659OpKjH

The U.S. is seeing 30000 new coronavirus cases each day. Yet the President is more concerned about saving face than helping Americans urging our country to slow down testing. Stop playing politics with American lives and get a national testing strategy together—now.

12 states have reached a record number of coronavirus cases since Friday.  The President calling to slow down COVID testing is NOT a way to stop the spread of coronavirus. It’s an example of negligent leadership that will result in misinformation & higher death rates.

Happy Father’s Day to my dad husband & all dads out there! We wished dad Happy Father’s Day through a closed glass window at the assisted living & even w/COVID at 92 he is still singing. Praying for strength & that all those years of biking & mountain climbing get him through♥️ https://t.co/QaxXaYNzHA

My husband has given his plasma twice. For anyone who has recovered from COVID giving plasma is a really good thing to do: Blood plasma from people who recovered is a safe civid-19 treatment study says https://t.co/AgpvHBVlo6

Pence is taking a COVID-19 victory lap as the U.S. hits a tragic new milestone: 2 million confirmed cases & 117000 deaths.    Our country is facing a public health crisis. Listen to health care experts & stop steering Americans in the wrong direction. https://t.co/tBO4A5VDd6

More than a month ago I urged the Administration to take action to help prisons as they face the coronavirus. The virus continues to spread throughout prison systems. It’s critical the Administration provides guidance & protects incarcerated people now. https://t.co/ExLGROtmtI

As we continue to fight the coronavirus every aspect of life has entered the home—school work & much more. But accessing these services is not possible without high-speed internet. We must close the digital divide & I will keep fighting to ensure we do. https://t.co/l0re1U6ja5

Some states have seen a surge in COVID-19 cases over the past couple of weeks yet we still don’t have a national testing strategy in place. We need one in order to rebuild our economy and get the country back to work.
And this is why we have inspector generals: Inspectors general warn that Trump administration is blocking scrutiny of coronavirus rescue programs https://t.co/cYpV46lEBi

About 3.5 million servicemembers & veterans were exposed to burn pits putting them at a higher risk of contracting COVID-19. @SenatorRounds @SenDuckworth @SenDanSullivan & I are calling on the Department of Defense & VA to ensure they get the care they need.
This is the leadership our country needs—and this COVID plan is one of many reasons we must elect VP @JoeBiden. https://t.co/bYxBqR3LUn

OK this is YOUR money  COVID loan program is key to our recovery but we can’t just have Trump saying “Trust me. You don’t need to know where your $511 billion went.”   Trump administration won’t say who got $511 bil in taxpayer-backed coronavirus loans https://t.co/m2kXaXeF3t

Yesterday the U.S. surpassed 2 million coronavirus cases — and the virus is still killing nearly 1000 Americans per day. It’s heartbreaking.   This pandemic is not behind us and we need to stay vigilant in making sure our communities are prepared.
Important development: Mayo Clinic unveils key COVID-19 antibody test. https://t.co/vr4uX0jlfC

We will all miss St. Paul school board chairwoman Marny Xiong who died from COVID-19 at 31. In the words of St. Paul Mayor Carter she  “embodied our city’s spirit gave her heart to our students and worked tirelessly to uplift the voices of the unheard.” https://t.co/x0V7cC9MkS

We are facing a dual pandemic—coronavirus & racism. Our country is crying out for justice as this pandemic is disproportionately affecting people of color across the country.  This week I spoke with @emarvelous about what we need to do to address the economic & social injustices. https://t.co/RbAscFMNZZ

Many servicemembers & veterans who were stationed near burn pits are vulnerable to coronavirus & face increased health risks due to toxic exposure. This week I introduced a bill with @SenatorRounds @SenDuckworth & @SenDanSullivan to ensure they receive the care they need.

Andrea Circle Bear was jailed for a non-violent offense and died from coronavirus after giving birth on a ventilator.  Paul Manafort was released from prison.  At a Judiciary hearing yesterday I demanded answers from the Administration on these two systems of justice.

Our country cannot divorce the impact of COVID-19 & the systemic injustices communities of color face every single day. Congress needs to step up and take action to reform our criminal justice system & invest in equal housing health care & much more. https://t.co/5QqlGGU3H3

COVID FACTS:   Over 1.5 million confirmed cases in the U.S. alone.  Nearly 100000 lives lost.  More than 38 million Americans unemployed.  AMERICA’S QUESTIONS: Why is the McConnell U.S. Senate schedule all about Trump appointed judges? Where are the bills to help people?

More than 400 bills are waiting on Mitch McConnell's desk everything from coronavirus response to climate change to prescription drug prices. But instead of bringing these up for votes he’s focused on advancing his judicial nominees. #CapturedCourts

Was in Hibbing today with local mayors advocating for federal funding for COVID-19 testing to protect our seniors and access to technology via the ACCESS Act to allow for virtual visits with loved ones in assisted living facilities.

Expanding vote by mail options is not a ‘power grab.’ Expanding options to vote is about protecting our democracy to ensure voters can safely cast their ballots during the coronavirus pandemic.  https://t.co/JwhdtNJ4qB

Nearly 100000 lives lost in the U.S. from the coronavirus.  And just 1% of them are on this page.  These lives lost are our neighbors our friends our loved ones our heroic front line workers. This is not just a statistic or a number. https://t.co/oBiziTCLNp

Michael Cohen & Paul Manafort both former Trump advisors were released from prison early due to COVID-19.  Andrea Circle Bear jailed for a non-violent offense died from the virus after giving birth on a ventilator.   There cannot be two justice systems. I’m demanding answers.

Pandemic puts spotlight on major long term issue of lack of access to good food. @rahmemanuel explains how people are dying at higher rates from Covid in food desert areas...Food Deserts Are Their Own Pandemic Hot Spots https://t.co/U23R6UI4rV

There are news reports of strokes with younger and middle-aged coronavirus patients. Sen. @marcorubio and I are urging the CDC to investigate and make sure medical professionals and the public are informed about this potential link. https://t.co/Qf2jyxcWhw

Many of our veterans are particularly vulnerable to the coronavirus pandemic especially those who were exposed to toxic substances from burn pits. I've asked the VA to do more to make sure our veterans get the care they need. https://t.co/gvZzgYOlQ6

Many people like @MarioDB & @JoeCunninghamSC & my husband John recovered from COVID-19 & donated plasma which could help others fight the virus. We urge the FDA & CDC to raise awareness of these important plasma donation programs.  For more info visit https://t.co/vRN9TEB28v

Good news: Many provisions from my bill to allow Americans to vote early and vote by mail are included in the new House coronavirus relief package with significant funding. I commend @SpeakerPelosi for her work on getting this done. https://t.co/s1cQieXfmx
Thank you to @MomsDemand and @Everytown for a great conversation on how women are leading the way on the front lines to tackle gun violence and the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/4xi0MGOolT

We’ve seen a rapid spread of coronavirus in state & federal prison systems and not enough is being done to protect incarcerated people from the virus. The Administration must do better. https://t.co/4FKI0YFWKC

This virus knows no bounds & it is affecting so many families across the country.  MN Attorney General @keithellison lost his mom to the coronavirus in March. Thank you for sharing her beautiful life story Keith. https://t.co/w55NSIWCSR

Our country has seen 1.2 million cases of coronavirus.  That's about 30% of the total cases worldwide but Americans make up just 4% of the world's population.  That doesn't add up.  This Administration needs to do better.

Yesterday on the Senate floor I told the story of an #ImmigrantHealthHero on the frontlines treating COVID-19 patients at Mayo Clinic. While she's saving lives she's worried she won't be able to stay here to do her work while filling out paperwork to prove she’s “worth keeping"

Last month people voted in garbage bags & homemade masks—many tested positive for COVID-19.  Like @donnabrazile said—I’m shocked we even have to write this.  Republicans played politics with people’s lives in WI. I have a bill so it doesn't happen again. https://t.co/28MoouF1l8

So on Frontier Airlines you now have to pay an extra fee to keep yourself safe from corona virus. As I said today at the Commerce hearing there needs to be fed. guidance in place so airlines can’t do this.   And I thought their half-tray tables were bad.. https://t.co/Gu6DcSSVIo

Many people are stepping up to help others right now including people who recovered from COVID-19 & are donating plasma to help fight this virus. My husband John did this a few weeks ago. Anyone who can give please consider: https://t.co/7Le4RNaOk9 https://t.co/wn3phtA3Y3

60 days have passed since COVID-19 took the first American life & we still don't have:  → Proper equipment for front line workers → A real national testing strategy → Enough funding to protect our democracy  It's clear -- Americans don't have the national leadership we need.

62000 lives lost to the coronavirus in our country alone. This is not a success story and saying as much is failing to recognize the Administration’s failure in responding to this crisis.  https://t.co/lqbFHLsBvM

The effects of coronavirus are scary for many families but this treatment of using antibodies from recovered patients could save lives. My husband John’s story is like so many & I’m so proud that he is helping others by donating his plasma. Learn more at https://t.co/qW1waNLnBt https://t.co/RfiqDuCrKT

COVID-19 may spread slower to some rural areas but with hospital closures a lack of resources and older and low-income patients its impact could be devastating. I have a plan so communities across rural America have resources to face this pandemic. https://t.co/mLVcczeDvu

As I said when she passed ⁦@keithellison⁩ ‘s mom was an incredible woman and a pioneer.  We now know how she died....Minnesota AG Keith Ellison's mother dies from COVID-19 complications. https://t.co/LBAjUmpPcz

Once prisons halted visits due to #COVID19 I teamed up with Sen @DickDurbin to help incarcerated people connect with their attorneys & family. Now @USFederalPrison is providing free calls for incarcerated people across the country. https://t.co/c2OeOzpuZC

Must read by ⁦@michele_norris⁩ (and policy decisions funding etc should be made with this simple truth in mind):  coronavirus is amplifying the bias already embedded in our social fabric https://t.co/IkTpfuZo40

A key to fighting #COVID19 is making testing more accessible. Every day we learn more about President Trump ignoring the warnings and delaying his response. We cannot allow the administration to continue to underestimate what needs to be done to fight this virus.

Many health care workers are risking their lives to save others -- some even contracting #COVID19. And even after recovering from this virus they continue to get back on their feet to fight this crisis. Thank you to our front line workers for all that you do for us. https://t.co/C6Z3f0t79C

As #COVID19 increases in rural communities these areas are faced with added obstacles -- including shortages of medical supplies & staff and closures of hospitals. Americans cannot be left behind in this crisis -- we must get rural areas proper care. https://t.co/UIVADps4sq

I’m outraged that reports show higher #COVID19 deaths & diagnoses among Black & Hispanic Americans. I'm fighting to make sure the CDC provides demographic data so we can understand the cause of these disparities & ensure resources go where needed most. https://t.co/2IOGpVn1jC

Time & time again this Administration has removed those responsible for telling the truth & holding those in power accountable. Americans need answers about his removal & oversight over the Administration’s implementation of the #COVID19 relief package.  https://t.co/4l3gLF7qH7

What's happening at polling locations across Wisconsin right now is outrageous. We cannot continue to ignore the threat that #COVID19 has on our elections.   We must plan ahead for Nov. & pass my bill to keep all Americans safe by expanding #VoteByMail & extending early voting.

The only way to know how many people are sick is to have more rapid coronavirus testing available. Rapid testing is a critical step in helping people get back to work get our economy up &running.  We need to get to a point where testing is ready &available to those who need it.

This can be a game changer....if people who have had the virus 🦠 have built up immunities the hope is that their blood can be used to help others who are very sick survive 🩸 🩸 Mayo to lead national COVID-19 plasma trial. https://t.co/fPbTTBFR7D

We need to make it safe & easy for Americans to vote during #COVID19. My bill would expand #VoteByMail extend early voting & give states money to train new poll workers. These are commonsense steps needed to protect the right to vote. Thanks @RolandsMartin for having me on. https://t.co/Q68itlOAlw

This is absolutely crazy.  The masks must go to the workers now:  I Spent A Day In The Coronavirus-Driven Feeding Frenzy Of N95 Mask Sellers And Buyers And This Is What I Learned https://t.co/mBAEuE5P1D

People across the country are coming together to tackle #COVID19. In MN a local distiller is taking on this crisis by making hand sanitizer for those in need — including a group that supported his family in the past. It's inspiring & we thank you.  https://t.co/FSWm50pnLU
